text: William Gaston Caperton III (born February 21, 1940) is an American politician. He was the 31st Governor of West Virginia from 1989 to 1997. He was president of the College Board, which administers the nationally recognized SAT and AP tests, from 1999 to 2012. He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of West Virginia Category:People from Charleston, West Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gaston Caperton
